name: do-py
description: Data validation and standardization library wrapping Python dictionaries.
author: Tim Davis <timdavis.3991@gmail.com>

scripts.test: pipenv run pytest -svo xfail_strict=True --durations 10 --maxfail 10 --cov ./ --cov-report html --cov-report xml --junitxml test-reports/tests.xml --cov-config=./tests/.coveragerc ./tests/
scripts.build: yarn clean && pipenv run python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel
scripts.release-test: yarn clean && yarn build && twine upload --repository-url https://test.pypi.org/legacy/ dist/*
scripts.release: yarn clean && yarn build && pipenv run twine upload dist/* && yarn clean
